physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Confusion, visual impairment, aphasia, memory loss, disorientation, delayed mental response; visual acuity normal on right side, altered on left; full muscle strength; no gaze palsy, ataxia, or pyramidal signs.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood tests revealed elevated ESR of 105 mm/h, IgG level rose to 7,690 mg/dL.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: MRI revealed multiple white matter lesions in right frontal and left basal ganglia regions.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: 1 year after presentation, follow-up MRI showed significant regression of the white matter lesions.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Dysarthria, nasal voice, dysphagia, fasciculating atrophied tongue, moderate muscle weakness, hyperactive jaw jerk, hyperreflexia in all limbs without pathologic reflexes.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Two months after cessation of pesticide use, motor weakness partially ameliorated, fasciculation ceased, mild tongue atrophy remained.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Impaired cognitive functions, hyperreflexia in all limbs, positive Babinski sign, bilateral cerebellar ataxia, urinary incontinence, wide-based gait.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Neurologic status unchanged during follow-up for 1 year.
